tag_list: green, energy, wind, power, renewable, technology, future
overview:
My partner and I started a LLC called GreenSky Wind Systems, based in Raleigh - North Carolina.

We are trying to build a prototype of a new expression of wind turbine, called the Toroidal Wind Turbine with a 100kW rating.

This machine has been developed in Australia by a senior aero-dynamics engineer and is more efficient and less costly than any other machines on the market.

GreenSky Wind Systems secured a full commercial license over the Americas and is looking to start up on the East Coast. We secured a distribution agreement with an US company over the Carolinas, Georgia and Virginia. We are targeting the US farmers that are trying to cut their electricity costs.

We are looking for money to build a prototype then get it certified by the end of June 2011. We will start selling in August 2011, and the company will be profitable in April 2012.

Check out our website : www.greensky-windsystems.com/home.html

Sincerely,

Quentin Ankri Founder GreenSky Wind Systems, LLC
